articles.title: Family affair as Nomsa Masuku's nephew appears in court for R1.2m graft case
articles.description: Ciniso Masuku, made his first appearance in the Specialised Commercial Crimes Court sitting in Palm Ridge on Tuesday.
articles.content:
A third person has been arrested and charged in connection with the R1.2-million fraud case of Nomsa Masuku, an Electoral Commission of South Africa (IEC) commissioner.

articles.title: NEW REPORT: Staffers 'were terrified' of leaks by Gabbard when investigating war crimes in Syria
articles.description: According to a bombshell report by NBC's Dan De Luca, Democratic and Republican congressional staffers "were terrified" of leaks by Tulsi Gabbard when a Syrian witness was called to testify against the brutal Assad dictatorship.
